about_the_game:
Minikle Backgrounds Bundle Fantasy part03 features fantasy single-picture material for ethereal Western-style castle settings! Ideal for RPGs and novel games, it features time variants for day, evening, night (lights on), night (lights off), cloudy, and rainy days, adding an ambient flair to your game aesthetics.
Add a unique sparkle to your adventure games with this pack.

*******************************************
Pictures: 36 (816x624, 1280x720)
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Minikle Backgrounds Bundle Fantasy part03 features fantasy single-picture material for ethereal Western-style castle settings! Ideal for RPGs and novel games, it features time variants for day, evening, night (lights on), night (lights off), cloudy, and rainy days, adding an ambient flair to your game aesthetics.
Add a unique sparkle to your adventure games with this pack.

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
